title: Bill Gates Raises Alarm Over AI's Potential Role In Bioterrorism
description: The expanding reach of artificial intelligence (AI), particularly through open-source platforms, could be exploited by non-government groups to advance bioterrorism, Bill Gates has warned. Writing in his yearly message titled ‘Optimism with Footnotes’, Gates said AI’s promise to reshape society must be weighed against the dangers it presents worldwide.
content:
